title: Pear frangipane
description: This pear and almond tart with swirls of melted chocolate marbled through it is served either warm or cold in generous wedges with a dollop of cream. You will need a 26cm/10½in loose-based fluted flan tin, roughly 3.5cm/1¼in deep.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz plain dark chocolate, broken into pieces
